titles.title: CLASS Act
A bill to provide assistance for educational facilities, and for other purposes.
CLASS Act
Consolidating Losses Associated to Severe Storms Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary:
Consolidating Losses Associated to Severe Storms Act of 2018 or the CLASS Act
This bill treats state educational facilities on a campus damaged by a major disaster in 2016 and 2017 as a single facility for purposes of the reduction of assistance provisions of the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act.
